title: Latest anti-retroviral drug regimens provide 'Lazarus Effect' for HIV patients

title_detail.value: Latest anti-retroviral drug regimens provide 'Lazarus Effect' for HIV patients

summary: Frailty related to HIV infection 'is rapidly becoming a specter of the past' and today it 'is possible to control HIV infection in all patients,' according to a perspective article.

summary_detail.value: Frailty related to HIV infection 'is rapidly becoming a specter of the past' and today it 'is possible to control HIV infection in all patients,' according to a perspective article.
